questions.question: 1. In MFC, the impedance refers to

answers.a: Total resistance to electrical current flow within the system.
answers.b: Total resistance to substrate utilization within the system
answers.c: Total number of transfer of electrons within the system.
answers.d: Total number of transfer of protons within the system.
